USPS workers have risked their own health to ensure America keeps running. That’s why I’m pushing for Congress to shore up USPS—so that everyone can continue to receive essential medicines and supplies, and citizens can vote from home. #SaveThePostOffice https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/04/11/post-office-bailout-trump/

#PPP UPDATE 3/7:
2nd:Main reason some #smallbusiness having trouble getting into PPP is banks are overwhelmed with applications. Even the biggest banks are struggling with the level of demand. 

One of the characteristics of crisis is that demand is greater than initial capacity.

RT @gillibrandny As part of a bipartisan challenge I’m launching with @SenTedCruz, I sent @defazios pizzas to front line medical staff staying at the Heroes Landing in Albany, New York.
 
Now I’m calling on @SenBooker, @LtGovHochulNY, and @DavidChang to take part! #CombatCOVID19Challenge http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1249826434354421762/img/YX_RS-jykn1pbhfS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1249826434354421762/vid/320x320/UP0fNxUVQdEs53Lb.mp4?tag=13

#PPP UPDATE 5/7:
4th:Claim that we don’t need more $ approved yet because very little has been disbursed is WRONG

Amount disbursed is irrelevant to need for additional funds. What’s relevant is amount approved. Lenders will stop approving #PPPloans when $ for guarantee runs out.
🧔💥🧔💥🧔 https://www.foxnews.com/media/rand-paul-gives-first-interview-since-recovering-from-covid-19

#PPP UPDATE 6/7:
5th:Some reports mix two unrelated programs,the pre-existing SBA emergency loans & #PPP.

The emergency loan program is designed for localized disasters (ie. hurricane) not a nationwide one. That is one of the reasons we created PPP.

Pelosi & Schumer are wrong about why  some #smallbiz having trouble accessing #PPP

It’s not because big banks are excluding them.

Its because ALL banks are overwhelmed with demand

That’s why we created path for non-bank lenders & need them approved ASAP https://www.washingtonpost.com/us-policy/2020/04/13/pelosi-schumer-coronavirus-congress-budget/

in those days, I will pour out my spirit.

Trump knows mail-in ballots mean a larger voter turnout, which he does not want to see.

That is pretty pathetic.

My colleagues and I are working as hard as we can to pass legislation so that as many people as possible can safely participate in our democracy. https://twitter.com/nprpolitics/status/1249717753742864384 QT @nprpolitics President Trump has incorrectly denounced voting by mail as widely susceptible to fraud.

But Trump himself voted by mail in Florida's presidential primary last month — and Florida Republicans have long supported mail-in ballots. https://www.npr.org/2020/04/11/831978099/even-as-trump-denounces-vote-by-mail-gop-in-florida-and-elsewhere-relies-on-it?utm_campaign=politics&utm_medium=social&utm_term=nprnews&utm_source=twitter.com
